title: Embracing Innovation, Collaboration and Elevation
description: Join us at Dev جرگہ Pakistan’s Tech Event for an exciting day of innovation, knowledge exchange, and community spirit in Islamabad. Dive into the latest tech trends, interact with industry leaders through insightful discussions, and network with fellow tech enthusiasts shaping the future.

aboutUs.title: About Dev جرگہ
aboutUs.description: We are a dynamic platform that empowers students and local tech enthusiasts to thrive in their respective fields. Join us to explore cutting-edge technology, gain insights from industry leaders, and collaborate on innovative solutions for local businesses and communities.

codeOfConduct.title: Mutual Respect and Diversity
codeOfConduct.description: Value and honor every participant by acknowledging their diverse backgrounds, including race, gender identity, disability, age, religion, and other individual characteristics.

codeOfConduct.title: Encouraging Inclusive Dialogue
codeOfConduct.description: Foster a welcoming atmosphere where everyone feels empowered to contribute, knowing their ideas and voices will be respected and valued.

codeOfConduct.title: Promoting Collaboration
codeOfConduct.description: Support a collaborative spirit by actively sharing insights, ideas, and experiences, while giving credit to others' work and respecting intellectual property rights.

codeOfConduct.title: Positive Event Experience
codeOfConduct.description: Uphold a harassment-free environment by avoiding offensive comments, threats, or any form of unwelcome behavior. Be considerate of others' boundaries and perspectives.

registerCard.title: Join Us for an Unforgettable Tech Enthusiast Gathering
registerCard.description: Discover new horizons in technology and become part of a unique and enriching experience.
